website_summaries.verdict: If you need an affordable oatmeal formula that has more to offer than just cleaning, you won't find a better shampoo at a lower price.
pros: A generous portion made even more cost-effective by its multi-use formula, this 32-oz shampoo and conditioner also deodorizes and moisturizes and can be used on cats
Owners love that it's organic and gentle enough to use on sensitive skin
cons: Some dog owners would prefer if it lathered a bit better
but this is a small issue considering the value size and affordable price
